home.content: Hello everyone, my name is Manson Fang and welcome to my world.

aboutme.content: I am currently a graduate engineer with a degree from the University of Technology Sydney. My goal is to learn, university has done wonders for my development and there is still an abundance of untapped knowledge for which i still haven't explored. Check out my education history through the button below.

projects.content: Check out my personal projects through clicking the button below.

project1.description: 3D portfolio that works smoothly on any device and provides interactive functionality and fun animations. Built with Javascript, React, Three.js, Tailwind CSS, and Blender.

project2.description: An interactive and entertaining Python-based guessing game with a user-friendly Tkinter GUI, offering word-based challenges, engaging and approachable hints, and a visually engaging design for an immersive and enjoyable player experience.

experience.name: Woolworths, Chatswood East
experience.description: Provided to managerial support for grocery manage through running the day-to-day routine and operation when required, provided coaching and training team members whilst maintained the standard and integrity of both the shop floor, back of house and inventory standard
